address_must_be_x_characters: Address must be {{ amount }} characters, it currently is {{ current }} character(s) long.
address_registered_info: Your address has been registered as ERC20 withdrawal address, allowing you to withdraw ERC20 funds into your TFT wallet.
address_registration_transaction_info: This transaction has registered your current address as ERC20 withdrawal address, allowing you to withdraw ERC20 funds into your TFT wallet.
choose_wallet_for_payment: Please choose which wallet you want to pay with.
create_address_registration_info: This transaction will register your current address as ERC20 withdrawal address, allowing you to withdraw ERC20 funds into your TFT wallet.
enter_how_much_you_want_to_receive: Enter how much you want to receive.
enter_your_pin_to_sign_transaction: Enter your pin to sign the transaction
erc_address_registration_complete_messag: Your ThreeFold address has been registered, however it may take up to an hour for the process to complete. Once the registration was successful any funds transferred in the meantime will be converted to ThreeFold tokens.

errors.address_not_found: Address not found, please import your seed before continuing.
errors.explorers_unavailable: The ThreeFold servers could not be reached. Please contact ThreeFold Support if the problem remains
errors.insufficient_funds: You don't have enough tokens to complete this transaction or have another transaction pending.
errors.provided unlock hash has an invalid chec: Invalid address, please verify if you have entered it correctly.
errors.unknown: An unknown error has occurred, please try again later

import_or_create_wallet: Do you want to import an existing wallet (using a 24 word seed), or create a new one?
minimum_required_tokens_for_transaction: A minimum of {{ amount }} tokens is required for this kind of transaction.
name: Name
no_spendable_tokens: You don't have any tokens that you can send.
no_wallet_message: You do not have any wallets yet. Click the button below to add one.
not_supported_pls_update: Please update the app to use this functionality
please_enter_a_pin_code_for_this_wallet: Please enter a pin code for this wallet.
receive_address_info: Click to copy the address, and share it with the sender.
transaction_complete_message: The transaction has been submitted and will appear under 'transactions' soon.
wallet_seed_explanation: These words are the "seed" of your newly created wallet. They are used to restore your wallet in case you want to access your wallet on another device.
wallet_seed_warning: Anyone with these words can use your wallet and make transactions, so be sure to store it somewhere safe and not to share it with anyone.
withdraw_explanation: You can withdraw funds from ERC20-compatible tokens to convert them into ThreeFold tokens. For this you must register your address as withdrawal address. This registration process requires a one-time cost of approximately 10.1 TFT.
x_requests_a_payment_of_y: {{ user }} requests a payment of {{ amount }}
you_already_have_wallet_with_name: You already have a wallet with this name, please choose another name.
